officialTitle: Effects of Perioperative Dexmedetomidine Infusion on Microcirculation and Kidney and Intestinal Injury in Kidney Transplant Recipients
inclusionCriteria:
* kidney transplant recipient
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
* Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* allergic history to dexmedetomidine
* refractory bradycardia \< 60 bpm despite treatment
* severe atrioventricular block (2nd and 3rd degree)
* previous operation of tongue
